member.name: T:HP.LFT.Verifications.IVerifyHandler
member.summary: Set of all Verification methods

member.name: T:HP.LFT.Verifications.Verify
member.summary: Class for verifying expected values in your application.
member.remarks: When a Verify method returns a false value, the step fails, but the failure does not throw an exception or cause the test to stop running.

member.name: M:HP.LFT.Verifications.Verify.GreaterOrEqual(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Checks whether the first number specified is greater than or equal to the second for integer values.
member.param: The first value, expected to be the larger number.
The second value, expected to be the smaller number.
An image related to the verification.

The second value, expected to be the smaller number.
An image related to the verification.

members.member:
Checks whether the first number specified is greater than or equal to the second for long values.
The first value, expected to be the larger number. The second value, expected to be the smaller number. The verification title. The verification description. An image related to the verification. int arg2, Image verificationImage
